blademaster:RagingBlow.NAME: Raging Blow
blademaster:RagingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 18 Fury. NL Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if the target has less than 50% of their HP remaining. If this kills the target, become Enraged.

blademaster:SecondWind.NAME: Second Wind
blademaster:SecondWind.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 3 Combo. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Wind Stance.

blademaster:BladeMastery.NAME: Blade Mastery
blademaster:BladeMastery.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Havoc Blade. NL Innate when upgraded. NL Exhaust.

blademaster:AwakeningStrike.NAME: Awakening Strike
blademaster:AwakeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Awaken !M! of your Havoc Blades.

blademaster:SharpBlades.NAME: Sharp Blades
blademaster:SharpBlades.DESCRIPTION: Your Havoc Blades apply 1 Bleeding on hit.

blademaster:SilverDagger.NAME: Silver Dagger
blademaster:SilverDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least 4 Combo, apply !M! Silvered.

blademaster:CloudOfSteel.NAME: Cloud of Steel
blademaster:CloudOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Lacerate to your hand for each Blade channeled.

blademaster:Meditate.NAME: Meditate
blademaster:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you channel a Blade, heal !M! HP.

blademaster:Breeze.NAME: Breeze
blademaster:Breeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a Gale to your hand.

blademaster:Recklessness.NAME: Recklessness
blademaster:Recklessness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and Channel 1 Havoc Blade.

blademaster:Gale.NAME: Gale
blademaster:Gale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a Zephyr to your hand. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

blademaster:RollingTyphoon.NAME: Rolling Typhoon
blademaster:RollingTyphoon.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 30 Fury to activate. NL Deal !M! damage. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

blademaster:WindSlash.NAME: Wind Slash
blademaster:WindSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Change your Stance to Wind Stance.

blademaster:Zephyr.NAME: Zephyr
blademaster:Zephyr.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

blademaster:WindRagingBlow.NAME: Wind Raging Blow
blademaster:WindRagingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 18 Fury. NL Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if the target has less than 50% of their HP remaining. If this kills the target, become Enraged. NL Get !W! Blur.

blademaster:WindRollingTyphoon.NAME: Wind Rolling Typhoon
blademaster:WindRollingTyphoon.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 30 Fury to activate. NL Deal !M! damage. Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Inflict Bleeding equal to 3 times the amount of Wind Charges. NL (You currently have !W! Wind Charges.)

blademaster:LightningRagingBlow.NAME: Lightning Raging Blow
blademaster:LightningRagingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 18 Fury. NL Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if the target has less than 50% of their HP remaining. If this kills the target, become Enraged. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of Lightning Charges. NL (You currently have !L! Lightning Charges.)

blademaster:LightningDash.NAME: Lightning Dash
blademaster:LightningDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.

blademaster:LightningCrash.NAME: Lightning Crash
blademaster:LightningCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.

blademaster:LightningRollingTyphoon.NAME: Lightning Rolling Typhoon
blademaster:LightningRollingTyphoon.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 30 Fury to activate. NL Deal !M! damage. Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain !L! Metallicize.

blademaster:EyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm
blademaster:EyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Lightning Stance. NL Whenever you're attacked, reduce the damage by 1 and gain 1 Lightning Charge.

blademaster:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
blademaster:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Basic Stance.

blademaster:BasicAttack.NAME: Basic Attack
blademaster:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Change your Stance to Basic Stance.

blademaster:FallBack.NAME: Fall Back
blademaster:FallBack.DESCRIPTION: Evoke ALL of your Blades. Gain !B! Block for each Blade evoked.

blademaster:Windwall.NAME: Windwall
blademaster:Windwall.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 5 Combo. NL Only playable in Wind Stance. NL Gain !M! Metallicize.

blademaster:LightningDraw.NAME: Lightning Draw
blademaster:LightningDraw.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 4 Combo. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Bleeding to ALL enemies. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.

blademaster:Surge.NAME: Surge
blademaster:Surge.DESCRIPTION: Only playable while in Lightning or Wind Stance. NL Consume up to 3 Charges and gain Artifact equal to the amount consumed.

blademaster:Stormstrike.NAME: Stormstrike
blademaster:Stormstrike.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Lightning Stance. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of Lightning Charges. NL (You currently have !L! Lightning Charges.)
